mapper.update: update OLQ_APPLICATION set DEL_FLG = '1' where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into OLQ_APPLICATION (PK_ID, OLQ_SQL, OLQ_DS_ID, MAX_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, NOTE, NAME, DESCRIPTION) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{olqSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{olqDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update OLQ_APPLICATION set OLQ_SQL = #{olqSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLQ_DS_ID = #{olqDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_NUM = #{maxNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select olq.PK_ID, olq.OLQ_SQL, olq.OLQ_DS_ID, olq.MAX_NUM, olq.DEL_FLG, olq.CRT_USER, olq.CRT_TIME, olq.UPT_USER, olq.UPT_TIME, olq.NOTE, olq.NAME, olq.DESCRIPTION from OLQ_APPLICATION olq where olq.DEL_FLG = '0' AND olq.PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, OLQ_SQL, OLQ_DS_ID, MAX_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, NOTE, NAME, DESCRIPTION from OLQ_APPLICATION where DEL_FLG = '0'

select olq.PK_ID, olq.OLQ_SQL, olq.OLQ_DS_ID, olq.MAX_NUM, olq.DEL_FLG, olq.CRT_USER, olq.CRT_TIME, olq.UPT_USER, olq.UPT_TIME, olq.NOTE, olq.NAME, olq.DESCRIPTION, ds.name DS_NAME, ds.PK_ID DS_ID from OLQ_APPLICATION olq LEFT JOIN COM_DATASOURCE ds ON olq.OLQ_DS_ID = ds.PK_ID and ds.DEL_FLG = '0' where olq.DEL_FLG = '0' and olq.PK_ID = #{pkId} and olq.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and olq.DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{describe}||'%' and olq.NOTE like '%'||#{note}||'%' and olq.OLQ_DS_ID = #{olqDsId} and ds.NAME like '%'||#{dsName}||'%' and olq.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= olq.CRT_TIME and olq.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= olq.UPT_TIME and olq.CRT_USER like '%'||#{crtUser}||'%' and olq.UPT_USER like '%'||#{uptUser}||'%' order by olq.NAME asc
select PK_ID, OLQ_SQL, OLQ_DS_ID, MAX_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, NOTE, NAME, DESCRIPTION from OLQ_APPLICATION where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
